document_data.name: Giant Rhinoceros Beetle
document_data.mainbody: '''Giant rhinoceros beetle''' were an uncommon species of giant [[beetle]] that dwelt in jungles.
document_data.Description: Giant rhinoceros beetles were the largest species of giant beetle, typically measuring at around {{SI|12|ft}} in length. They had a single giant horn that extended to a length of {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}}. Their shells were usually iridescent or brightly colored.
document_data.Behavior: When searching for food these creatures were liable to crush anything that stood in their way.
document_data.Combat: Giant rhinoceros beetles used their large mandibles and single large horns in combat to damage any opponents that got near to them.

Ecology.Diet: These creatures primarily ate fruits and vegetables, which they foraged for in their jungle habitats.
Ecology.Habitats:
Giant rhinoceros beetles primarily inhabited the jungles of tropical or subtropical regions.

In [[Interior Faerûn]], they could be found in the jungle within the [[Cathedral of Emerald Scales]]. In [[South Faerûn]], they inhabited the [[Forest of Amtar]] and the [[Long Forest]].

Beyond [[Faerûn]], in the [[Crowded Sea]] they inhabited the group of islands known as the [[Djinni's Claws]].
Ecology.Usage:
The shells of these creatures were often used by [[cleric]]s of specific pantheons to decorate their temples.

Giant rhinoceros beetle carapace can be used to craft a ''[[rhino beetle shield]]'', a naturally light and tough [[tower shield]], usually of [[duergar]] making.
